title: The Hyper-Specific Holiday Gift Guide
itunes:title: The Hyper-Specific Holiday Gift Guide
description:
Your kooky aunties are here to tell you what to buy for all the loved ones and weirdos in your life. But this is not just any old gift guide, oh no! This gift guide gets quirky. Gifts for That One Friend Who Always Laughs When People Trip and Fall, or the Cousin Who Collects Elaborate Vintage Tea Sets. Definitely a gift for the Person We All Know Who Has Daily Mantras and Uses Essential Oils. Everything you need for those three and a couple more, right here. 

For product links and good times, follow @addtocartpod on Instagram. 

Stay up to date with us on Twitter, Facebook, and Instagram at @LemonadaMedia.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
